overview: Slime creator Indy (Bibi) has to come up with a super cool new slime recipe for a big Slime Gala. When she secretly adds octopus slime while making it, magical colors are created. This is the best slime she's ever made! But when jealous slime creator Benji (Matheu Hinzen) steals the recipe, everything goes wrong. Can Indy stop Benji and win back her slime fans?
title: The Even Bigger Slime Movie
